about_the_game:
The Burial of Shortcake” is an unpredictable story. It is a new visual novel with characters designed by voice actor Nozomi SASAKI, whose “expressiveness” shines through because of her experience as a performer.

Click on the screen to read the story.

Game Features

Genre: Crime suspense visual novel

Play time: 5 to 7 hours

Choices: None. One way

Story.

'Sweat, dirt, blood. It all goes in my mouth and makes me want to throw up.”

For some reason, the main character, Season, sneaks into a mountain forest in the middle of the night to bury a dead body.

A shovel for shoveling snow.

A supermarket shopping cart.

And wrapped in a blue sheet, he hid it.

Surrounded by them, Season.

Sweating, swallowing blood and dirt, he digs a hole.

And then I realized.

“Where's ......?”

Beyond the hole, beyond the tragedy, there is no end.

This film depicts the end of tragedy.

Crime suspense visual novel--“The Burial of Shortcake”.
